value:
You haven't seen any rats lurking
about, have you? I could've sworn
I heard their wretched squeaking...

Care to hear a secret? I'm actually
a magical cat! ...Wait—you didn't
actually believe that, did you?

There's no need to thank me for my
work. But if you truly insist, I could
always go for a shoulder massage.

Can you stop by my room later?
I plan to be up all night concocting
elixirs, and I need a helping hand!

Hnnn....mmmmm.....rrrrgghh...
Oof, I didn't even stand a chance
at that staring contest, huh?

A certain someone asked that I divine
your future, $Nu.$k$pJust don't shoot the messenger, OK?

Well, this is certainly a surprise...
This power must be the result
of all your support.

Just as I foresaw. There is no need
to waste precious energy when you
already know the outcome.

I knew this would happen but... Ugh!
Don't look at me like that! This was
fate, you hear me? Fate!

For me? Really? Aww, you shouldn't
have... That said, there had better be
more where that came from. Hahaha!

I am Orochi, diviner of Hoshido and
seer of all. Your future is but a glance
away...if you wish to know it.

"I am Orochi. I am everywhere, and
I am nowhere." What do you think?
Not bad as a self-introduction, huh?$k$pI thought I should prepare one, since
other summoners will no doubt also
desire my services.$k$pAny moment now, I will be whisked
off to some battle or festival or—
What's that? You want me to stay?$k$pI-is that some sort of joke? You're
getting me back for all of those
mean tricks I played, aren't you?$k$pHmph. If fate truly has decided that
I shall remain here, by your side...
Well, I certainly won't complain.
せやっ
どうじゃ？
なぬっ！？
やりおるな…
You'll regret angering me.
It's over!
I've had enough.
You're in the way!
The future is dark...
Hahaha...
I am Orochi, a diviner in service of Hoshido's royal family.
Ah! What in the—?! If you're really that pressed for something to do, make yourself useful and fetch me some herbs.
Queen Mikoto loved me like I was her own daughter. I'll never forget that kindness.
*giggles a couple times*... Oh, sorry! I was remembering a rather amusing story.

Your fortune is...
(chosen randomly)
→ The best!
→ Good.
→ Um... It's bad.
Queen Mikoto...please watch over me...
I once failed to protect someone I cared about... But on my pride as a diviner, I swear that shall not happen again!
As was foretold.
Hm?
We think alike, you and I.
